thothbot.parallax.core.shared.scenes
Class Scene

java.lang.Object
  thothbot.parallax.core.shared.objects.Object3D
      thothbot.parallax.core.shared.scenes.Scene
All Implemented Interfaces:
DimensionalObject
public final class Scene
extends Object3D

3D Scene. The basic class for rendering. To use this Object in rendering you should add at least one DimensionalObject and Camera. Also you may want to add Lights and Fog to the Scene Object.

Author:
thothbot
